pos review: It was really quiet and comfy I couldn't have choose a better place to stay
Central position, good price, helpful stuff
my room was bright and clean

pos review: Smart breakfast, clean and comfortable room. Nice location. Great personals.
I liked the en suite shower. Good breakfast, nice variety.
Stayed for one night. The hostel is much better in person than on the pictures here. The rooms and the shared areas were spic and span. It's also an easy walk from Brussels Central and Grand Palace.
neg review: The timed lights in the bathroom and shower.
